attributes.title: god awful
attributes.review:
this app shouldn’t be on here. tbh this shouldn’t even exist or have been thought about. trump himself has to work on this even tho he possibly doesn’t have the mental capacity to run a app. that’s why he had money to make people do his work. besides that it took my microwave and gave it to this mickey mouse person who asked to play a game. he told me my address and then i said that’s correct and he said he’s on his way. after that he played this game and then he put something weird in me. after that he left which is why my microwave is gone. i can’t even make pizza rolls. besides that the mickey also did something else and it hurt a lot. i called the police after they asked for my ethnicity and they hung up. besides that there was a picture on my arm with my blood which is why it hurts a lot and i’m blanking our so bye.
heart ❤️ been broke 💔 so many times ⏰ i don’t 🤷‍♀️ know what to believe 💭 yeah 👍 mama 👩🏾 said it’s my fault 👎🏿 it’s my fault👎🏾 i wear my heart ❤️ on my sleeve 😔

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app thinking i was finally get that healthy orange glow that i was promised but it crashed IMMEDIATELY! it fried my phone from the inside out and i was able to get it to load on my ipod mini 😌 i was wrong to assume all my trouble were gone because this app called me the f slur and c slur 🤬🤬 i got a text from the trump campaign to look out my window and i saw the 8ft tall legend himself, barron. i was like omg why is here and he yelled at me “Y/N LOOK OUT BEHIND YOU!” but it was too late😔 mike pence had snuck behind me and struck me across the head with his orange silicon 3ft dildo, killing me on impact. he also kicked my dog on the way in. i’m writing this review from hell rn 🤬🤬 1 star i do not recommend 😡

attributes.title: TERRIBLE SERVICE
attributes.review: I downloaded this app, and 6 minutes later my HOUSE EXPLODED. Not only did this troompa loompa guy tell me to “work hard to buy a new one” he threw his sock at me and it was as hard as a ROCK. This app has the letter T on it and thats stupid because T is for Twitter not Tw4t and I think the NEW letter should be P. And if you don’t know what it means than golly gee you’re in for a treat. But after having this app for TWENTY minutes my LEG FELL OFF and his team said i “shouldn’t have used 5g” like COME ON you REALLY think i can afford that?? With THIS economy? no baby we using 3gLTE because i cant afford to EAT. The app has a pig wearing a tie as a cover and you really thought downloading it would be smart 😔

attributes.title: Horrible malfunctions
attributes.review: This app is the worst! I want all of the real factual information that I can get but this is just all propaganda and lies from the Cheeto man. On top of the lies as soon as I opened the app I was FORCED to lay my GORGEOUS VIRGIN EYES upon the one and only 🤢🤮 Cheeto man himself. This app is a horror to society and must be taken down immediately. This app also caused my phone to glitch more often and has caused some serious damage to the brain function of many adults in our society. The lies that this app feeds us all must be taken down and destroyed once and for all. ACAB and tuck Frump. Gen Z will NOT be messed with and we will fight back even harder if you continue with your racist and sexist values.

attributes.title: No one cares about you
attributes.review: He only wants to make America white again and he thinks he knows what best for us but really he sounds like a child talking non sense and homophobic and he think black people are making America the worst place possible like no your about to die and you want to get all the money in the world that’s all and this app needs to be taken down now because it is trash and it runs way to slow and I hate because trump is a man that’s only wants America white and he wants all the color people to go back to their country and stuff and he is trying to send us back to school like it just going to get the numbers higher stupid

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: I had to delete this app only five minutes after opening it. It slammed me with adds and made my phone glitch out. I truly believe it gave my phone a virus and now I have to go to a professional to see how to remove it. When I opened the app it kept a opening adds and wouldn’t let me X out the adds without accidentally tapping the adds therefore leading me to the App Store. Only when I crossed out the App Store would it let me go back to the app. THIS WAS ONLY THE FIRST FIVE MINUTES OF USING THE APP🤮🤮 To all the Nancy and Karen trump supporters out there I have to warn you not to get this app in order to support your Cheeto puff president because it will only lead to problems

attributes.title: THE WORST APP🤬!
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to learn a little bit more about my favorite orange🥰 but I soon as I downloaded it, the app was asking me about my race🤨 and to prove that I’m in the country legally, because they would deport me if I wasn’t😳, I decided to delete the app because they could deport my tíos and tias😟 but as soon as I deleted the app, the big cheeto pulled up to my house and threatened me to vote for him because if I didn’t he would pee all over my house🤯 and make my fish drown😱. Anyways I wouldn’t recommend this app, please do NOT download it because you will have nightmares about the big fat cheeto for over a month, trust me I’m still going to therapy for what he did to me😣.

attributes.title: Worst App EVER!!
attributes.review: This is such a horrible app, when I logged in I saw so many inappropriate things that I cant really explain in this review. (naked pics) 🤮 I was so disgusted and even my little sister saw it and fainted. So now we have to stay in the hospital because of you guys. I hate this app so much and I want it deleted immediately. I’m so disgusted that Apple hasn’t even deleted yet, because of the inappropriate things on there. I hope this App gets deleted soon, it caused a lot of damage to me and my family, and if you don’t delete this APPLE I WILL SUE YOU. SUE YOU FOR LETTING PEOPLE SEE THIS AND NOT DOING ANYTHING! I’ve also seen other reviews that are worse, and Apple hasn’t done anything. #DELETETHISAPP2020
